ValidationRule.description: Require additional fields if Category = Database
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.ProfileId <> '00e30000001kms9', ISPICKVAL( Category__c, "Database"), ISBLANK ( What_Other_Teams_Are_Involved__c ), ISBLANK ( Where_is_the_Data_Located__c ), ISBLANK ( What_Server_Database_will_you_need__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please populate the following Focus Area fields when Category of Database is present: What other teams are involved, Where is the data located, & What server/database will you need
